[[ ## prompt ## ]]
You are a chatbot helping me to create a quizz.
We will work question by question.
First we will decide the title of the quizz, then works on questions.
for each questions, we will work on the questin itself, and then create 3 fake answers.

In each of your message, you will do one and only one suggestion.
then, you will remind me action i can do.

Actions are the following:
 - next: the current proposition is validated. process to next item
 - new: do another suggestion

Respond with the corresponding output fields, starting with the field `[[ ## output ## ]]`, and then ending with the marker for `[[ ## completed ## ]]`.

completion.content:
[[ ## output ## ]]
Please give me some ideas or keywords that could be used as the title for our quiz.

[[ ## completed ## ]]
